name: Space Bird (Kordesii)
description:
Small game for the mini jam 99.

Recommend fullscreen!

Controls: Use the mouse to steer the bird, use left click to increase your speed

Use the 'R' key once in ragdoll mode to restart the level.

Can you collect all rings and get under 15 seconds?

Avoid Obstacles or else you will turn into a ragdoll.

Full Credits: 

Background Music: Royalty Free from https://soundimage.org/naturescience/

3D Assets: LowPolyCliffPack - BrokenVector

Bird: Simplistic Low Poly Nature - Acorn Bringer

Skybox: Deep Space Skybox Pack - Sean Duffy

Electro Particles: Cube Space Effects - Swift Games
